name: Levels of Urbanization and per capita GNP in Various Regions - Bairoch (1988)
title: Levels of Urbanization and per capita GNP in Various Regions - Bairoch (1988)

sources.name: Bairoch (1988)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Bairoch, P., 1988. Cities and Economic Development, translated by Christopher Braider.

resources.path: Levels of Urbanization and per capita GNP in Various Regions - Bairoch (1988).csv

fields.name: Urban population share (Bairoch (1988))
fields.description:
The percentage of the population classified as urban. A criterion of 5000 is used for urban population.

The 'developed countries' regional category excludes Japan.

fields.name: Rural population share (Bairoch (1988))
fields.description:
The percentage of the population classified as rural. A criterion of 5000 is used for urban population.

The 'developed countries' regional category excludes Japan.
